answers.author: Rebecca VanRegenmorter
answers.text:
Tanya,
Here at the ICMA Center for Performance Measurement, we ask in our Human Resources Survey whether the jurisdiction offers pay for performance or merit based pay programs. The jurisdictions then provide an explanation of their program. As Mankato is a participant in the Center, you have access to this data. I will e-mail you the information we have collected.
If anyone has any questions about the Center or the types of measures we collect please contact me at (rvanregenmorter@icma.org; 202-962-3585).
